entry.title: rails3
entry.content:
とりあえずこんな流れでいいのだろうか…? ``` [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ mkdir Rails3TestDrive [~/Creations] [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ cd Rails3TestDrive [~/Creations] [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ vi Gemfile [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive] [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ rvm use 1.9.3 [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive] Using /Users/matsuki_hidenori/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p125 [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ bundle install --path vender/bundle [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive] Fetching source index for http://rubygems.org/ Installing rake (0.9.2.2) Installing abstract (1.0.0) WARNING: abstract-1.0.0 has an invalid nil value for @cert_chain

Installing activesupport (3.0.12) Installing builder (2.1.2) WARNING: builder-2.1.2 has an invalid nil value for @cert_chain

Installing i18n (0.5.0) Installing activemodel (3.0.12) Installing erubis (2.6.6) Installing rack (1.2.5) Installing rack-mount (0.6.14) Installing rack-test (0.5.7) Installing tzinfo (0.3.33) Installing actionpack (3.0.12) Installing mime-types (1.18) Installing polyglot (0.3.3) Installing treetop (1.4.10) Installing mail (2.2.19) Installing actionmailer (3.0.12) Installing arel (2.0.10) Installing activerecord (3.0.12) Installing activeresource (3.0.12) Using bundler (1.0.22) Installing json (1.7.1) with native extensions Installing rdoc (3.12) Installing thor (0.14.6) Installing railties (3.0.12) Installing rails (3.0.12) Your bundle is complete! It was installed into ./vender/bundle [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ du -d1 -h [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive] 4.0K ./.bundle 28M ./vender 28M . [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ bundle exec rails new . [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive]

   exist  
  create  README
  create  Rakefile
  create  config.ru
  create  .gitignore
conflict  Gemfile

Overwrite /Users/****/Creations/Rails3TestDrive/Gemfile? (enter "h" for help) [Ynaqdh] y

   force  Gemfile
  create  app
  create  app/controllers/application_controller.rb
  create  app/helpers/application_helper.rb

  create  config

  create  config/initializers
  create  config/initializers/backtrace_silencers.rb
  create  config/initializers/inflections.rb
  create  config/initializers/mime_types.rb
  create  config/initializers/secret_token.rb
  create  config/initializers/session_store.rb
  create  config/locales
  create  config/locales/en.yml
  create  config/boot.rb
  create  config/database.yml
  create  db
  create  db/seeds.rb
  create  doc
  create  doc/README_FOR_APP
  create  lib
  create  lib/tasks
  create  lib/tasks/.gitkeep
  create  log
  create  log/server.log
  create  log/production.log
  create  log/development.log
  create  log/test.log
  create  public
  create  public/404.html

  create  public/500.html
  create  public/favicon.ico
  create  public/index.html
  create  public/robots.txt

  create  public/stylesheets
  create  public/stylesheets/.gitkeep
  create  public/javascripts
  create  public/javascripts/application.js
  create  public/javascripts/controls.js
  create  public/javascripts/dragdrop.js
  create  public/javascripts/effects.js
  create  public/javascripts/prototype.js
  create  public/javascripts/rails.js
  create  script
  create  script/rails
  create  test
  create  test/fixtures
  create  test/functional
  create  test/integration
  create  test/performance/browsing_test.rb
  create  test/test_helper.rb
  create  test/unit
  create  tmp
  create  tmp/sessions
  create  tmp/sockets
  create  tmp/cache
  create  tmp/pids
  create  vendor/plugins
  create  vendor/plugins/.gitkeep

[User@Darwin11.3.0] $ bundle install [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive] Fetching source index for http://rubygems.org/ Using rake (0.9.2.2) Using abstract (1.0.0) Using activesupport (3.0.12) Using builder (2.1.2) Using i18n (0.5.0) Using activemodel (3.0.12) Using erubis (2.6.6) Using rack (1.2.5) Using rack-mount (0.6.14) Using rack-test (0.5.7) Using tzinfo (0.3.33) Using actionpack (3.0.12) Using mime-types (1.18) Using polyglot (0.3.3) Using treetop (1.4.10) Using mail (2.2.19) Using actionmailer (3.0.12) Using arel (2.0.10) Using activerecord (3.0.12) Using activeresource (3.0.12) Using bundler (1.0.22) Using json (1.7.1) Using rdoc (3.12) Using thor (0.14.6) Using railties (3.0.12) Using rails (3.0.12) Installing sqlite3 (1.3.6) with native extensions Your bundle is complete! It was installed into ./vender/bundle [User@Darwin11.3.0] $ bundle exec rails generate scaffold User name:string [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive]

  invoke  active_record
  create    db/migrate/20120507130958_create_users.rb
  create    app/models/user.rb
  invoke    test_unit
  create      test/unit/user_test.rb
  create      test/fixtures/users.yml
   route  resources :users
  invoke  scaffold_controller
  create    app/controllers/users_controller.rb
  invoke    erb
  create      app/views/users
  create      app/views/users/index.html.erb
  create      app/views/users/edit.html.erb
  create      app/views/users/show.html.erb
  create      app/views/users/new.html.erb
  create      app/views/users/_form.html.erb
  invoke    test_unit
  create      test/functional/users_controller_test.rb
  invoke    helper
  create      app/helpers/users_helper.rb
  invoke      test_unit
  create        test/unit/helpers/users_helper_test.rb
  invoke  stylesheets
  create    public/stylesheets/scaffold.css

[User@Darwin11.3.0] $ bundle exec rake db:migrate [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive] == CreateUsers: migrating ==================================================== -- create_table(:users) -> 0.0018s == CreateUsers: migrated (0.0019s) ===========================================

[User@Darwin11.3.0] $ bundle exec rails server [~/Creations/Rails3TestDrive] => Booting WEBrick => Rails 3.0.12 application starting in development on http://0.0.0.0:3000 => Call with -d to detach => Ctrl-C to shutdown server [2012-05-07 22:10:18] INFO WEBrick 1.3.1 [2012-05-07 22:10:18] INFO ruby 1.9.3 (2012-02-16) [x86_64-darwin11.3.0] [2012-05-07 22:10:18] INFO WEBrick::HTTPServer#start: pid=21495 port=3000 DEPRECATION WARNING: config.action_view.debug_rjs will be removed in 3.1, from 3.1 onwards you will need to install prototype-rails to continue to use RJS templates . Started GET "/users/new" for 127.0.0.1 at 2012-05-07 22:10:51 +0900 Processing by UsersController#new as HTML Rendered users/_form.html.erb (15.5ms) Rendered users/new.html.erb within layouts/application (20.7ms) Completed 200 OK in 29ms (Views: 24.4ms | ActiveRecord: 0.0ms)
